attributes.action: Nationalise energy companies! The government need to do a lot more to help.
attributes.additional_details:
The government need to fight to nationalise energy companies.
The government need to put pressure on energy companies to use their profits to subsidise bills for regular people in the UK.
The government need to take a stand (like other countries have done) against the corruption and profits of the energy companies - boasting their highest profits yet, whilst also announcing raising costs! 
The government need to fight for the people they serve, for their safety, and for their comfort!  
Help…
attributes.background: Energy companies are boasting highest profits ever whilst the rest of us are struggling to have our lights on or scared to use any energy in our own homes. The government need to take a strong stand and nationalise energy companies to ensure the safety of the people in this country! Please sign!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621719
